data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sehnal, Richard (2017): A new species of Pegylis Erichson, 1847 (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae: Pegylini) from Ethiopia. Zootaxa 4323 (3): 423-426, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4323.3.8|2 occurrences
